channel.title: HELP ME! I'll give you a pat on the back!
channel.description:
Umm... how do i change the log-out button's window text - know wat I mean (example: Click here to log out you noob!)? Also, how do I change wat is said wen someone logs in (For Example: Welcome to DemonScape PK, type ::rules for the rules!)
I would be grateful for your help!
~Unholy Angel

item.title: HELP ME! I'll give you a pat on the back!
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

this is the second time you posted this
change these
sendQuest(“To Leave TestScape safely”, 2450);
sendQuest(“click the logout button below”, 2451);
sendQuest(“Thanks for playing.”, 2452);

and this
sendMesage("Welcome to DemonScape PK, type ::rules for the rules!);

Read full topic
item.source: HELP ME! I'll give you a pat on the back!

item.title: HELP ME! I'll give you a pat on the back!
item.dc:creator: @f_r_e_e f r e e
item.description:
@f_r_e_e wrote:

*EASTER DROP*/ //if(hasegg == 0) //addItem(1961, 1); //hasegg = 1; /*END OF DROP*/ sendQuest("To Leave TestScape safely", 2450); sendQuest("click the logout button below", 2451); sendQuest("Thanks for playing.", 2452);

search for something along those lines in your Client.java

Read full topic
